title: Strengthening Teaching Method Practical Competencies: Function Machine Learning Environment for Elementary Students' Variable Understanding Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic computation skills and experience in simple pattern recognition
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Input-output relationships can be visually represented and explained through function machine simulations
Variable symbols can be interpreted in contextual situations and mathematical relationships can be converted into equations
Developmental stage-specific representational system changes in learners can be analyzed to design personalized feedback strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
